titles.title: To designate the mountain at the Devils Tower National Monument, Wyoming, as Devils Tower, and for other purposes.
To designate the mountain at the Devils Tower National Monument, Wyoming, as Devils Tower, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 20 - 13.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 115-630.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 138.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: This bill declares that the mountain at the Devils Tower National Monument in Wyoming shall be known and designated as "Devils Tower."
